member.name: M:osu.Game.Rulesets.Mania.Beatmaps.Patterns.Legacy.PatternGenerator.FindAvailableColumn(System.Int32,osu.Game.Rulesets.Mania.Beatmaps.Patterns.Pattern[])
member.summary: Finds a new column in which a can be placed. This uses to pick the next candidate column.
member.param: The initial column to test. This may be returned if it is already a valid column.
A list of patterns for which the validity of a column should be checked against. A column is not a valid candidate if a occupies the same column in any of the patterns.
member.returns: A column for which there are no s in any of occupying the same column.
member.exception: If there are no valid candidate columns.

member.name: M:osu.Game.Rulesets.Mania.Beatmaps.Patterns.Legacy.PatternGenerator.FindAvailableColumn(System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Func{System.Int32,System.Int32},System.Func{System.Int32,System.Boolean},osu.Game.Rulesets.Mania.Beatmaps.Patterns.Pattern[])
member.summary: Finds a new column in which a can be placed.
member.param: The initial column to test. This may be returned if it is already a valid column.
A function to retrieve the next column. If null, a randomisation scheme will be used.
A function to perform additional validation checks to determine if a column is a valid candidate for a .
The minimum column index. If null, is used.
The maximum column index. If null, TotalColumns is used.
A list of patterns for which the validity of a column should be checked against. A column is not a valid candidate if a occupies the same column in any of the patterns.
member.returns: A column which has passed the check and for which there are no s in any of occupying the same column.
member.exception: If there are no valid candidate columns.

member.summary: 1 -> 5 -> 1 -> 5 like reverse.
